mains.name: The Caesar
mains.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with our homemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and shredded parmesan cheese.

mains.name: Surf & Turf
mains.description: A grilled, queen-cut ribeye served with shrimp and scallop alfredo.

mains.name: Creamy Sage
mains.description: Chicken breast sautéed with fresh sage and prosciutto. Served atop creamy asiago linguini.

mains.name: From the Sea
mains.description: Fresh haddock, gulf shrimp, and sea scallops dipped in beer batter and fried to a golden brown.

mains.name: Poulet Makkhani
mains.description: Poulet au beurre (plat signature). Mélange riche et crémeux de tomates, de beurre, de curry et d'épices avec une viande tendre.

mains.name: Chicken Marsala
mains.description: Boneless chicken breast sautéed with mushrooms and finished in a marsala and cream reduction.
